markdownRemark.excerpt: Sometimes my cursor on laptop (Ubuntu) not work. It doesn’t move. So when it happended I usually open terminal and type Then my cursor work again.
markdownRemark.html:
Sometimes my cursor on laptop (Ubuntu) not work. It doesn’t move. So when it happended I usually open terminal and type

$ gsettings set org.gnome.settings-daemon.plugins.cursor active false

Then my cursor work again.

frontmatter.title: Some of Google Cloud Platform Command I use
